{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.6M in 2021-2022** on contracts with AB SCIEX.

Across 88 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 10 have at least one amendment (11%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 210% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$1.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.93 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$121.3K. The longest contract was 5.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.6M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
